General.Name: Otovo AS
General.Description: Otovo ASA engages in the operation of online marketplace for solar systems. It develops and manages an online sales platform, which is involved in the provision of subscription services and sale of solar panel installations and related products for private households. The company operates in Austria, Belgium, France, Germany, Italy, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, and the United Kingdom. Otovo ASA was founded in 2016 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.
